entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Extend support for using AOT libraries in other AOT .NET libraries/executables #40799

Closed

  • CLI Feature: Design Pattern Templates for .NET Projects #40769
  • [ARM64]The Form1.cs[Design] page cannot load successfully after installed the latest .NET 9.0 Preview4 or Preview5 #40786
  • [NETSDKE2E]The winforms application which is generated by self-contained publish cannot run successfully. #40173
  • Bad UX for .NET Core SDK Windows Installer -- .NET Core Host in use #9350
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Bug dotnet/sdk-container-builds#559: PublishContainer Appends "dotnet <Target>.dll" to ENTRYPOINT for Self Contained Builds #40792
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Fix DisableWorkloadResolverSentinelPath on .NET Framework #40787
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

Merged

  • Increase test timeout because of slow arm64 legs #40790
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up contents from previously-sb tarball post binary-cleanup #40772
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #40697
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #40640
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Publish PRs for Source-Build Test Results #40753
    source-build, Area-VMR
  • Fix ignored paths used by binary tool #40777
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Stop Running SDK Diff Test Pipeline on Branches Affected by Installer -> SDK merge #40779
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • feat: Add support for updatedTypes in metadata updates #40416
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2448062 #40693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
